quotes.author: BoJack
quotes.quote: He’s so stupid he doesn’t realize how miserable he should be.

quotes.author: Sextina Aquafina
quotes.quote: I think about my child’s heartbeat and oh, it makes me weep. I hope and pray to God my little fetus has a soul. Because I want it to feel pain when I eject it from my hole.

quotes.author: BoJack
quotes.quote: Ow, crap. I hate this. Running is terrible. Everything is the worst.

quotes.author: Mr. Peanutbutter
quotes.quote: The universe is a cruel, uncaring void. The key to being happy isn’t the search for meaning; it’s just to keep yourself busy with unimportant nonsense, and eventually, you’ll be dead.

quotes.author: Henry Winkler
quotes.quote: There is no shame in dying for nothing. That’s why most people die.
